apps.name: Anti Proxy
apps.subtitle: AI-Powered Attendance System
apps.localizedDescription: Advanced CV-based attendance marking system with face recognition. Features automatic student detection, real-time processing, and comprehensive attendance tracking for educational institutions.

versions.localizedDescription:
Initial release featuring:
• Face recognition attendance
• Real-time student detection
• Firebase integration
• Local data storage
• PDF export functionality
• Multi-class support

entitlements.name: Camera Access
entitlements.localizedDescription: Required for face recognition and attendance marking

entitlements.name: Photo Library Access
entitlements.localizedDescription: Required for saving and managing student photos
